actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8e of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1933, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to domestic tomatoes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act, to subject imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to domestic tomatoes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8e of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1933, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to restrictions comparable to those applicable to domestic tomatoes.
